title: how to prepare for a league of legends match
body:
step one: locate your emergency hazmat suit. make sure its available for use at any time.
step two; locate your breathing mask, and confirm it's filters are not expired.
step three; equip your breathing mask, along with your safety goggles
step four; equip your hazmat suit and rubber gloves.

congratulations, you are now almost ready to handle the toxicity,
next, please coat your entire computer in lead (with exception of the monitor for viewing purposes) and enjoy your game.

replies.body: how to avoid toxicity i league of legends. uninstall and play better games

It's more like.


1) Take a hammer to your router
2) Get your sister pregnant 9 months prior to playing ranked
3) Wait until your family wants you for a family event in just five minutes
4) You are now in the perfect situation to play ranked.
Be the change you wish to see...
